posts.name: Michelle
posts.cooked:
We’re releasing the Signal 7.59 beta soon. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group here.

Share your feedback on the latest changes:

  • Nothing user facing yet. Even more backup fixes!

Complete list of new commits since 7.58.2:
https://github.com/signalapp/Signal-Android/compare/v7.58.2…main

Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.58 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.59.0 (159500)

Builds will no longer be published to Firebase App Distribution

27 new commits since 7.58.2:

Show commits

  • Several navhost behavioural updates to ensure the right pane is displayed at the right time. [1]

  • Upgrade compose to latest stable. [2]

  • Fix DonationsService ServiceResponse to use exception body instead of message. [3]

  • Fix indeterminate progress dialog animation. [4]

  • Eliminate dependency material icons core. [5]

  • Do not reroute to main activity if launching in a bubble. [6]

  • Bump to libsignal v0.82.0 [7]

  • Prevent infinite archive attachment reconciliation attempts after server storage quota disagreement. [8]

  • Media review - Fix alignment of recipient name and arrow. [9]

  • Fix incorrect nav bar colors on registration screens for Android 8.1 and newer. [10]

  • Fix outgoing disappearing message export oddity check. [11]

  • Add proper gesture when user navigates to or from a conversation. [12]

  • Apply missing callback for entering remote backups settings fragment. [13]

  • Fully check result code when processing purchase results. [14]

  • Add more compose preview annotations. [15]

  • Add additional dialog checks. [16]

  • Clear etag on internal only config refresh. [17]

  • Drop duplicate name error when editing profiles. [18]

  • Bump to libsignal v0.82.1 [19]

  • Fix bad data for users that rotated their recovery key. [20]

  • Release polls behind feature flag. [21]

  • Dedupe attachment downloads for matching attachments and fix size calculations. [22]

  • Reject last-use kyber key sets that we've seen before. [23]

  • Show character count when creating a poll. [24]

  • Update button color when viewing votes. [25]

  • Update translations and other static files. [26]

  • Bump version to 7.59.0 [27]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Android v7.58.2…v7.59.0

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn’t).

At least 66 languages changed since 7.58.2:

For technical reasons, not all languages may be listed below. However, everything from “Updated language translations” and similar commits is listed, so the list is likely complete. You can view the full comparison to 7.58.2 so far here.

link_counts.title: Get the latest Android releases even faster with Firebase App Distribution

posts.name: Julio Nahum
posts.cooked:
I have a problem with I’m having trouble making a donation to earn a monthly badge. When I manually enter my card details or use Gpay, I get an error:

Screenshot_20251002-1522111080×911 45.6 KB

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.59.0/b7f7cb529fafcedc6c140b2f0e142d9a7ba4d6b2a8ccdf6661830fb89eda6504

Tried to restore my backup again and unfortunately still have the same issue as the previous build

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.59.0/b83969c4650ed7d52556d9c6788b338385961641f2fa54bc4a78c2bef230052c

posts.name: ClauZ
posts.cooked:
Gunter:

still have the same issue as the previous build

Could you elaborate a bit more, about the issue you’re having, and possibility the steps to reproduce the issue, maybe if others can reproduce the issue, it can help the devs track down the cause

Michelle is already aware of it I posted it and described the issue in the previous thread just wanted to update that the backup fixes in 7.59 didn’t fix it for me yet as requested

Update:gonna try and create a new backup key and will update this post if it fixes anything.

Polls coming to Signal eventually!

updates-bot:

Release polls behind feature flag. [21]

updates-bot:

Show character count when creating a poll. [24]

updates-bot:

Update button color when viewing votes. [25]

Link to the feature request: Group chat polls - #198 by rassilon1963

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
Help! I can’t receive!

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.59.0/431f344e860dae4cd85bdcbfc48a46d2f28f5db3bed43c099a63d47c78fbb82c

I’m seeing that my client is super rate limiting itself and can no longer receive :(

Getting hundreds of these:
[7.59.0] [1865  ] 2025-10-03 10:06:54.347 GMT+02:00 I libsignal               rust/net/src/chat/server_requests.rs:137: received message at x-signal-timestamp: 1759478813711 (this is not a message ID)

Beta 59.0 does not show me whether a message was delivered or read.

I don’t receive any messages!

And Signal tells me all the time that it’s possible that I have new messages.

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.59.0/f5eb5e28f87e74a4ab3e691a237a03872b2b4e6e8a801d31dfff433747c81bec

I hope there will be an update today otherwise I have to wait until Monday to receive messages. Or maybe somebody knows a workaround?

I have already deactivated automatic updates in Obtanium. Usually I didn’t download .0 updates.

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.59.0/4e78d62dd1581b4d2a65cc79dd21f5fab220ebcbaeeb02a94e78006a842852f4

posts.name: Talya (she/her)
posts.cooked: i mean if you have backups enabled i’d suggest just rolling back.

posts.name: Michelle
posts.cooked:
JulioNahum:

I have a problem with I’m having trouble making a donation to earn a monthly badge

Tracking!

Gunter:

gonna try and create a new backup key and will update this post if it fixes anything

Please let me know if that changes anything. We are tracking it internally but the nature of backups makes debugging really difficult sometimes .

Whatnoww:

Help! I can’t receive!

erik55:

I don’t receive any messages!

Help is on the way! Sorry for the issues - we should have something out in a few hours to fix it.

Do you know if it is possible to make a backup, install an older version of Signal and then restore that backup there?

(maybe I don’t need that as a fix seems to be on its way)

mtang-signal:

Please let me know if that changes anything. We are tracking it internally but the nature of backups makes debugging really difficult sometimes .

I tried to create a new recovery key too many times and got rate limited but once I’m able to opt back into backups I’ll keep you posted

New Version: 7.59.1 (159600)

Builds will no longer be published to Firebase App Distribution

5 new commits since 7.59.0:

  • Show skip restore warning. [1]

  • Drop UNIQUE constraint from table column. [2]

  • Show correct dialog when validating AEP after registration. [3]

  • Update translations and other static files. [4]

  • Bump version to 7.59.1 [5]

posts.cooked: @Whatnoww @erik55 Hopefully this should be fixed with 7.59.1 - please let me know if it isn’t. And thanks again for your patience in testing.

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
I’ll let you know as soon as it hits GitHub :)

Thank you!!

posts.name: Hugo
posts.cooked: @Whatnoww @erik55 I was able to download 7.59.1 just now

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked: Working! Thank you!!!
